evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

evidence.text: Roberts. The injunctive and declaratory relief sought is appropriate and will apply to all members of the subclass.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

evidence.text: A. Declare that the suit is maintainable as a class action pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 23(a) and 23(b)(1) and (2);
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Declare that the suit is maintainable as a class action pursuant to Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 23(a) and 23(b)(1) and (2)

evidence.text: B. Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants, and their
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants, and their agents

evidence.text: C. Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law, from subjecting prisoner Plaintiffs and the Plaintiff Class to the illegal and unconstitutional conditions, acts, omissions, policies, and practices set forth above.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law, from subjecting prisoner Plaintiffs and the Plaintiff Class to the illegal and unconstitutional conditions, acts, omissions, policies, and practices set forth above

evidence.text: D. Order Defendants and their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law, to develop and implement, as soon as practical, a plan to eliminate the substantial risk of serious harm that prisoner Plaintiffs and members of the Plaintiff Class suffer due to Defendants’ inadequate medical, mental health, and dental care, and due to Defendants’ isolation policies.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Order Defendants and their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law, to develop and implement, as soon as practical, a plan to eliminate the substantial risk of serious harm that prisoner Plaintiffs and members of the Plaintiff Class suffer due to Defendants’ inadequate medical, mental health, and dental care, and due to Defendants’ isolation policies

evidence.text: E. Award Plaintiffs the costs of this suit, and reasonable attorneys’ fees and litigation expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1988, and other applicable law;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Award Plaintiffs the costs of this suit, and reasonable attorneys’ fees and litigation expenses pursuant to 42 U.S.C. § 1988, and other applicable law

evidence.text: F. Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction

evidence.text: G. Award compensatory damages in an amount to be determined for all physical, psychological, mental, and emotional injuries, as well as loss of liberty, sustained by Plaintiffs and the class as a result of the policies and practices alleged herein;
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Award compensatory damages in an amount to be determined for all physical, psychological, mental, and emotional injuries, as well as loss of liberty, sustained by Plaintiffs and the class as a result of the policies and practices alleged herein

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

evidence.text: I. Award reasonable attorneys’ fees, together with the costs of this action; and
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Award reasonable attorneys’ fees, together with the costs of this action

evidence.text: J. Award such other and further relief as the Court deems just and proper.
evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: Award such other and further relief as the Court deems just and proper
